00027 CGEngine::CGEngine()
00028 {
00029 }

00031 CGEngine::~CGEngine()
00032 {
00033     map<string, CGMoleculeDef *>::iterator i;
00034     for(i=_molecule_defs.begin(); i!=_molecule_defs.end();++i)
00035         delete (*i).second;
00036     _molecule_defs.clear();
00037 }
00038 
00042 TopologyMap *CGEngine::CreateCGTopology(Topology &in, Topology &out)
00043 {
00044     MoleculeContainer &mols = in.Molecules();
00045     MoleculeContainer::iterator iter;
00046     TopologyMap *m = new TopologyMap(&in, &out);
00047     for(iter=mols.begin(); iter!=mols.end(); ++iter) {
00048         Molecule *mol = *iter;
00049         CGMoleculeDef *def = getMoleculeDef(mol->getName());
00050         if(!def) {
00051             cout << "--------------------------------------\n"
00052                  << "WARNING: unknown molecule \"" << mol->getName() << "\" with id "
00053                  << mol->getId() << " in topology" << endl
00054                  << "molecule will not be mapped to CG representation\n"
00055                  << "Check weather a mapping file for all molecule exists, was specified in --cg "
00056                  << "separated by ; and the ident tag in xml-file matches the molecule name\n"
00057                  << "--------------------------------------\n";
00058             continue;
00059         }
00060         Molecule *mcg = def->CreateMolecule(out);
00061         Map *map = def->CreateMap(*mol, *mcg);
00062         m->AddMoleculeMap(map);
00063     }
00064     out.RebuildExclusions();    
00065     return m;
00066 }
00067 
00068 void CGEngine::LoadMoleculeType(string filename)
00069 {
00070     Tokenizer tok(filename, ";");
00071     Tokenizer::iterator iter;
00072    
00073     for(iter=tok.begin(); iter!=tok.end(); ++iter) {
00074         CGMoleculeDef *def = new CGMoleculeDef();
00075         string  file = *iter;
00076         boost::trim(file);
00077         def->Load(file);
00078         _molecule_defs[def->getIdent()] = def;
00079     }
00080 }
